Brown Rice and Peas

Rice and Peas

Ingredients

  1. Short Grain Brown Rice (2 cup dry)
  2. Overnight Soaked Kidney Beans (1 cup wet)
  3. Coconut Milk
  4. Habanero (1x)
  5. Green Onion (1 stalk)
  6. Fresh Thyme ()
  7. Spices
    • Allspice (1/4 tsp)
    • Salt (3/4 tsp)
    • Black Pepper (1/4 tsp)
  8. Green peas

Instructions (Rice Cooker)

  1. Add all dry ingredients to rice cooker
  2. Treat beans as rice: add necessary water for 3 cups of rice
  3. Cook
  4. Fill half the pot with water and close the lid to steam the cauliflower
  5. When the cauliflower is soft enough add the frozen peas on top and close the lid
  6. Remove extra water so cauliflower doesn’t get soggy

Optional

  1. Green chillies
  2. Fresh coriander for garnish
